review.reviewBody:
Delicious!!! Will definitely order it again.
The Nutella pizza needs more Nutella though.

pizzas were delicious as usual.  

My one friend was impressed with the fresh and flavourful ham on hers. She was not expecting it to be that good  honestly. 

I keep coming back for the vegan caverna pizza that is my fave. 

the chicken cha cha my other friend enjoyed immensely too.
Pizza tasted good, although the crust was quite chewy, and I was also kind of disappointed at the small amount  of cheese and salami that was on the pizza given the price. ($23.00 for a small pizza)
Best pizza ever loved it. Will for sure order it again. Caprese salad was great. Chocolate mousse was not good. Chocolate was over cooked or had water spilled in it. Very grainy tasting
Pizza is good but $17 for some pasta and cream sauce and no toppings? Whack...
